content: Another topic for discussion in FHIR-I -- I want to bring up the idea of routinely recording calls and posting these publicly so folks can review later (given the conversation with Jens about a decision from a recent call, I realize recordings can play an important complementary role alongside minutes).
Saw this too late to act on it today, but will try to remember to do so going forward

That would be useful for some WGM sessions as well. I still don't know the outcomes of the GraphDefinition meeting held during the last WGM - it was held at 1am my time, and not having a backyard shed like Grahame, I couldn't burden my family with a call at that hour of the day..
